statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, customer_name, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating <= 2 ORDER BY feedback_text DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_name = 'John' AND rating = 5;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT service_name, rating FROM TravelServices ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT service_name, description FROM TravelServices WHERE description LIKE '%luxury%';
SELECT customer_id, feedback, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%great%';
SELECT * FROM TravelServices WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT service_name, description FROM TravelServices WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT customer_id, avg(rating) as avg_rating FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_name, date_of_birth FROM customer ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT destination, travel_date, experience_rating FROM travel_experience WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer WHERE date_of_birth < '2000-01-01';

SELECT customer.customer_name, travel_experience.destination, travel_experience.experience_rating FROM customer JOIN travel_experience ON customer.customer_id = travel_experience.customer_id WHERE travel_experience.travel_date >= '2021-01-01' AND travel_experience.experience_rating > 4;
SELECT customer.customer_name, feedback.feedback_text, feedback.rating FROM customer JOIN feedback ON customer.customer_id = feedback.customer_id WHERE feedback.rating < 3;

SELECT customer.customer_name, customer.email, travel_experience.destination, travel_experience.travel_date FROM customer LEFT JOIN travel_experience ON customer.customer_id = travel_experience.customer_id ORDER BY travel_experience.travel_date ASC;
SELECT id, customer_id, feedback, rating, date_submitted FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback, date_submitted, id, rating FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT service_name, price, availability, service_description, service_id FROM travel_services;
SELECT rating, description, experience_name, location, experience_id FROM travel_experiences;
SELECT review, customer_id, rating, id, date_submitted FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY date_submitted DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback, DATE(date_submitted) AS submission_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT service_name, service_description, price FROM travel_services WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT experience_name, location, description, rating FROM travel_experiences WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC, location ASC;
SELECT review, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE DATE(date_submitted) = '2022-09-15' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers;
SELECT service_name, description, price FROM Services;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM Reviews;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT service_name, description, price FROM Services WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM Reviews WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT service_name, description, price FROM Services WHERE service_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
